content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_campfire
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_pressure_plate", "quantity": 54, "index": 10}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "book", "quantity": 55, "index": 18}, {"type": "end_portal_frame", "quantity": 35, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "diamond_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "detector_rail", "quantity": 40, "index": 29}, {"type": "polished_andesite_slab", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "white_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 55, "index": 42}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a soul_campfire, I need to craft a stick first. To craft a stick, I need to place two planks side by side in the crafting table. I will first move the jungle_planks at slot 43 to slot 1 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 43 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 4 with quantity 1
